rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment with the main door, using natural light to create a positive energy flow.
Spacious living room adjoining the entrance hall, oriented towards the courtyard for better ventilation and sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
Dining area that connects to the kitchen, designed with a central layout that fosters social interaction and maintains balance.
Primary bedroom located in the north-west corner for calmness and stability. Features ample storage and natural ventilation, ensuring privacy and serenity.
Secondary bedroom placed with south-east orientation to promote energy balance as per Vastu norms.
Well-equipped kitchen designed for optimal workflow. Positioned adjacent to the dining area and connected to the courtyard, facilitating fresh air circulation.
Essential bathroom facilities designed with efficient water drainage in mind; includes a window for ventilation as per Vastu suggestions.
Servants' quarters strategically placed at the rear of the house, ensuring privacy and ease of access while considering Vastu principles by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.

A central open courtyard that serves as a natural light well for adjoining rooms, enhances air circulation and complies with traditional Indian architectural design norms including Vastu considerations.

openings.description: Large entrance door placed on the eastern facade to welcome positive energy as per Vastu, with a wide threshold for ease of movement.
Multiple windows around the living area and bedrooms ensuring adequate natural light and proper ventilation, in compliance with both modern design and Vastu principles.

building_dimensions.description: The overall plot dimensions for the contemporary bungalow are 50x80 feet. The design carefully integrates modern aesthetics with traditional Vastu principles.

design_notes: This single-story 2BHK bungalow is designed keeping in mind Indian architectural norms and local building codes. All spaces have been planned to ensure natural ventilation, optimum utilization of space, and adherence to contemporary design aesthetics while incorporating essential elements like a central courtyard and servant quarters for a balanced living environment.
